entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
